text: Ras Jua Baraka (born April 9, 1970) is an American politician. He is the 40th and current Mayor of Newark, New Jersey. He was a member of the Municipal Council of Newark. His father was poet Amiri Baraka. On February 19, 2024, Baraka announced that he would run for Governor of New Jersey in the 2025 election. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Newark, New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians
title: Ras Baraka
